html:
Nov 8 (Reuters) - AMAZON WEB SERVICES, INC:

  • AWS ANNOUNCES PLANS TO OPEN SECOND REGION IN CANADA

  • AMAZON WEB SERVICES, INC - NEW AWS CANADA WEST (CALGARY) REGION WILL BE AVAILABLE IN LATE 2023/EARLY 2024

  • AMAZON WEB SERVICES - NEW AWS CANADA WEST (CALGARY) REGION WILL CONSIST OF 3 AVAILABILITY ZONES AT LAUNCH AND JOIN EXISTING AWS CANADA REGION IN MONTREAL

  • AMAZON WEB SERVICES - OVERALL, AWS ESTIMATED TO INVEST OVER $17 BILLION IN CANADA BY 2037 THROUGH CONSTRUCTION & OPERATION OF TWO INFRASTRUCTURE REGIONS

Source text for Eikon: (Full Story)

Further company coverage: AMZN.O
